The Swedish Academy had been criticized for not inviting Dylan to the award ceremony, and for not awarding him the prize in Stockholm. In 2017, the Academy announced that it would delay the announcement of the 2017 laureate, and would not announce the 2018 laureate, until it had resolved its internal issues. The Academy was criticized for its handling of the situation, and for not taking action against Jean-Claude Arnault, a French photographer and husband of a member of the Academy, who had been accused of sexual assault. In January 2018, the Academy announced that it had appointed a committee to investigate the allegations against Arnault. The committee found that Arnault had sexually assaulted a number of women, and that he had been involved in a number of other sexual assaults. The committee also found that Arnault had been involved in a number of other activities that had caused damage to the Academy. The committee recommended that Arnault be expelled from the Academy, and that the Academy be dissolved. The Academy accepted the committee's recommendations, and dissolved itself. The Academy was dissolved on 4 April 2018, and the Nobel Prize in Literature was not awarded in 2018.

[English]:

src_text: ၼၢင်းၵျီႇၶိူဝ်ႇ ပိုၼ်ၽၢဝ်ႇလွင်ႈၵၢင်ၸႂ်မၼ်းၼၢင်း တႃႇတေၶဝ်ႈၶႄႉၶဵင်ႇၸွမ်ၸိုင်ႈ တီႈၸၢတ်ႈၸိူင်းၸၢဝ်းဢႃႇၵျိၼ်ႇတီးၼႃး သေ တီႈၼၼ်ႉၵွၺ်း မၼ်းၼၢင်းယၢမ်ႈတႄႇတင်ႈ လွင်ႈဝၢင်းၽႅၼ် 2005 တႃႇ ၸုမ်းသၽႃးသႄးၼဵၵ်ႉ လူၺ်ႈပဵၼ် ၽူႈၶဝ်ႈၸုမ်း ၶွင် Buenos Aires လွင်ႈၸႅၵ်ႇဢမ်းၼၢတ်ႈၸိုင်ႈၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
ref_text: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

It is believed the pyramid was built as a tomb for Fourth Dynasty Egyptian Pharaoh Khufu (Cheops in Greek) and constructed over a 20-year period concluding around 2560 BC. Initially at 146.5 metres (481 feet), the Great Pyramid was the tallest man-made structure in the world for over 3,800 years. Originally, the Great Pyramid was covered by casing stones that formed a smooth outer surface, and what is seen today is the underlying core structure. Some of the casing stones that once covered the structure can still be seen around the base. There have been varying scientific and alternative theories regarding the Great Pyramid's construction techniques. Most accepted construction hypotheses are based on the idea that it was built by moving huge stones from a quarry and dragging and lifting them into place. The Great Pyramid and the three pyramids of Giza are the only pyramids left standing from the ancient world. The others were either deliberately or accidentally destroyed. The Great Pyramid of Giza is the oldest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, and the only one to remain largely intact.

[English]:

src_text: ဝႃႈၼၼ်သေတႃႉၵေႃႈ လွင်ႈဝၢင်းၽႅၼ်ၸိူဝ်းၼႆႉလႆႈထုၵ်ႇတုမ်ႉတွပ်ႇၶိုၼ်း ၶႂ်ႈၸမ်ပူၼ်ႉၶမ်ႈၶိုၼ်းလဵဝ်ၵူၺ်းဝႃႈ ပၢၼ်မၼ်းမူတ်းယဝ်ႉၼႆသေ ဝၢႆးသေလွင်ႈၶႂၢၵ်ႈႁူမ်ႇငမ်း ၼင်လိၼ်ပွတ်းဢွၵ်ႇၶွင် မိူင်းပူဝ်ႇလၢၼ်ႇ လူၺ်ႈလွင်ႈယႃႉလူႉလိၵ်ႈၵိၼ်ၵႅၼ်ႇ ၶွင်လွင်ႈၵိၼ်ႇၵႅၼ်ႇငမ်းယဵၼ်ရိၵ ၊ လွင်ႈၵိၼ်ၵႅၼ်ႇ လွင်ႈဢမ်ႇႁဵတ်းႁၢႆးၼိူဝ်ၵၼ် သူဝ်ႇဝိယႅတ်ႉ လႄႈ ၸၢဝ်းပူဝ်ႇလၢၼ်ႇ လႄႈ လိၵ်ႈၵိၼ်ၵႅၼ်ႇၵူႈမိူင်းမိူင်း လူၺ်ႈတင်းလွင်ႈတိူဝ်ႉတင်းသွင်ၽၢႆႇ လႄႈ တိူဝ်ႉတင်းၼမ် ၼၼ်ႉသေ မိူဝ်ႈၼၼ်ႉ လုၵ်ႈသိုၵ်းၼႂ်း တပ်ႉသီလႅင်ၶွင်မိူင်းႁူမ်ႈတုမ် သူဝ်ႇဝိယႅတ်ႉ 800,000 ၵေႃႉပၢႆပၢႆၼၼ်ႉ ၶဝ်ႈၵႂႃႇသေ သၢင်ႈၶိုၼ်ႈပဵၼ် ၼႃႈသိုၵ်းၶွင်မိူင်းပႄႇရႃႇရုတ်ႉ လႄႈ မိူင်းယူႇၵရဵၼ်း ယူႇယဝ်ႉ။

hyp_text: Multiple sclerosis (MS) is a disease that affects the brain and spinal cord. It damages the myelin sheath, the material that surrounds and protects nerve fibers. This damage disrupts the ability of parts of the nervous system to communicate, resulting in a wide range of signs and symptoms, including physical, mental, and sometimes psychiatric problems. MS is a chronic disease that can be unpredictable. The severity of the disease varies from person to person. Some people may be mildly affected while others may be severely disabled. The disease can also vary in severity over time. Relapses can occur, and remissions can occur. MS is the most common inflammatory central nervous system disease in young adults and is one of the most common causes of neurological disability in younger people. It is also the most common non-traumatic cause of neurological disability in young adults. The disease is most common in temperate regions, and is rare in tropical countries. The disease can occur at any age, but most commonly it is diagnosed between the ages of 20 and 40. It is twice as common in women as in men. MS is a chronic disease. There is no cure, but treatment can help manage the disease. This includes medication, rehabilitation, and support. The main symptom of MS is a relapsing-remitting course where patients experience attacks of worsening neurologic function, followed by partial or complete recovery periods (remissions). Between 85% and 90% of MS patients experience this form of the disease. In MS, the immune system attacks the protective sheath (myelin) that covers nerve fibers and causes communication problems between your brain and the rest of your body. [Shan]: ပိူင်တႅၵ်ႈမၼ်း၊ ပီၼိုင်ႈလႄႈပီၼိုင်ႈ လုၵ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶွင်ႁူင်းႁဵၼ်း ‘Bennet School’ ၼႂ်းမိူင်းၶႄႊလိၾေႃႊၼီႊယႃႊပွတ်းႁွင်ႇ (North Carolina) ၶဝ်ၼၼ်ႉ လႆႈႁဵတ်းဢွၵ်ႇ ဝဵပ်ႉသၢႆႉ (website) ၼိုင်ႈဢၼ် ၵဵဝ်ႇလူၺ်ႈၵၢၼ်ဢွၵ်ႇလႄႇလဵပ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶွင်ၶဝ်တီႈဝဵင်းလူင်ၶွင်ၸိုင်ႈမိူင်း (State Capital) ၊ ပီၼိုင်ႈလႄႈပီၼိုင်ႈၼၼ်ႉ ၽၢင်ႁၢင်ႈဝဵပ်ႉသၢႆႉၶဝ်တေလႅၵ်ႈလၢႆႈသေႇသေႇ၊ ၵူၺ်းၵႃႈ ၽၢင်ႁၢင်ႈဝဵပ်ႉဢၼ်ၵဝ်ႇၶဝ်ၵေႃႈၵဵပ်းဝႆႉယူႇၼိူဝ်ဢွၼ်ႊလၢႆႊ တႃႇၸႂ်ႉပဵၼ်ပပ်ႉၵဵပ်းႁွမ်ၶေႃႈမုၼ်းလႄႈၶႅပ်းႁၢင်ႈ။
[English]:

src_text: လွင်ႈတႅမ်ႈပလွၵ်ႉ (Blogs)ၸၢင်ႈၸွႆႈထႅမ်ပၼ်ပႃး လွင်ႈတႅမ်ႈလိၵ်ႈလုၵ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶဝ်တိူဝ်းတွၼ်းၶိုၼ်ႈယႂ်ႇမႃးယူႇယဝ်ႉ။ မိူဝ်ႈၽွင်းလုၵ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶဝ် တႄႇတႅမ်ႈတူဝ်ထူပ်း blog ၶဝ်လူၺ်ႈလွင်ႈပိူင်တႅမ်ႈလိၵ်ႈၽိတ်း လႄႈလွင်ႈလေႃးတူဝ်လိၵ်ႈၽိတ်းယူႇၼၼ်ႉ ၵူၼ်းပၼ်ႁႅင်းတူၺ်း(ပရိတ်ႈသၢတ်ႈ)ၵေႃႉၼိူင်ႈယင်းလႅၵ်ႈလၢႆႈမူၼ်ႉမႄးပၼ်လွင်ႈၸိူဝ်းၼၼ်ႉတၢင်းၼမ်ယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
ref_text: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.
hyp_text: Blogging can help students who are struggling with writing. When students first start blogging, they usually write about their personal experiences and feelings. This can be a good way for them to get started. However, it is also important for them to learn how to write objectively and to use evidence to support their claims. This can be a challenge for many students, but it is an important skill to develop.

src_text: ဝဵင်း Ottawa ၼႆႉ ပဵၼ်ဝဵင်းလူင်ၶွင်မိူင်းၶႄႊၼႃႊတႃႇ (Canada) ဢၼ်မီးတၢင်းႁၢင်ႈလီ၊ မီးၵၢၼ်ၸႂ်ႉတိုဝ်းၽႃႇသႃႇၵႂၢမ်းလၢတ်ႈသွင်မဵဝ်း၊ လႄႈ မီးဝႆႉႁွင်ႈၼႄၶႅပ်းႁၢင်ႈပၢႆးမွၼ်း ဢိၵ်ႇပႃး ႁွင်ႈၼႄပိုၼ်း ဢၼ်ၼႄဝႆႉသိူၵ်ႈပိုၼ်း မိူဝ်ႈပူၼ်ႉမႃးလႄႈၵၢပ်ႈပၢၼ်ယၢမ်းလဵဝ်ၶွင်မိူင်းၶႄႊၼႃႊတႃႇ (Canada) ပေႃးၶပ်ႉယႆၵၼ်လူင်ဝႆႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။

[Shan]: ၵၢၼ်ပဵၼ်ၼမ်ႉၼိုင်ႈၸႂ်လဵဝ်ၵၼ်ၼႂ်းဢွင်ႈတီႈႁဵတ်းၵၢၼ်ၼၼ်ႉ လမ်ႇလွင်ႈတေႉတေႉ၊ ႁႂ်ႈဝႆႉၼမ်ႉၼၵ်းလႄႈပၼ်ႁႅင်းၼိူဝ် ၼႃႈၵၢၼ်ဢၼ်ၵူႈၵေႃႉၼႂ်းၸုမ်းၸွႆႈၵၼ်ႁဵတ်း ၼမ်လိူဝ်သေ ၵၢၼ်ယုၵ်ႉယွင်ႈလွင်ႈဢွင်ႇမၢၼ်ၶွင်ၵူၼ်းၵေႃႉလႂ်ၵေႃႉၼိုင်ႈၵူၺ်း။
[English]:

src_text: ၵူၼ်းႁဵတ်းၵၢၼ်ၶဝ် ၶေႃႈတႅပ်းတတ်းဢၼ်ၶဝ်ႁဵတ်း ဢၼ်လႂ်သေဢမ်ႇဝႃႈ တၵ်းတေလႆႈၵႆႉဢဝ် လွင်ႈမၵ်းမၼ်ႈ ၽူႈယႂ်ႇလိူဝ်ၶဝ်ယဝ်ႉ၊ ယဝ်ႉၵေႃႈ မီးပုၼ်ႈၽွၼ်းတေလႆႈႁဵတ်းသၢင်ႈၸွမ်းၶေႃႈသင်ႇ ၽူႈယႂ်ႇလိူဝ် လူၺ်ႈဢမ်ႇလူဝ်ႇလႆႈ ဢွၵ်ႇၶေႃႈထၢမ်သင်ၶိုၼ်းယဝ်ႉ။
ref_text: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
hyp_text: Workers have the right to choose the trade union they wish to join, but they must not be forced to join a particular trade union against their will. They must be free to choose a union of their own free will and not be forced to join a particular trade union against their will.
